description: These sweetcorn quesadillas are a speedy and cheesy vegetarian lunch option, ready in minutes.
name: Smoky Sweetcorn Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 spring onions, finely sliced, green tops reserved
1 medium lime, zest of half, 1/2 chopped into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the sweetcorn, spring onions and green chilli for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the paprika, lime zest and garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Divide the mix between 2 large tortillas and sprinkle grated mozzarella on top. Add another tortilla on top of each and press down the spread the filling.

Brush the rest of the oil on the outside of each quesadilla. Place the first quesadilla in a large pan on medium heat and cook for 2 minutes, flip carefully and cook for 1 minute. Repeat with the second quesadilla.
Slice each quesadilla into 8 pieces and serve with lime wedges.
